positions.comment: At wharf in Battle Harbour.  Sailed in SW 30 knots in Labrador Current of 4.5 C
Still at wharf in Battle Harbour.  SW Gales
At anchor in St. Mary''s Harbour.  Waiting for a weather window to cross to Green
Underway to Greenland.  NE winds 20 knots.
Underway to Greenland.  NW winds 15 knots. Clear sky, fine sunset.  Air temp 8 C
Underway to Greenland.  SW winds veering to; NW. Foggy and cool
NE winds 25 with occasional gusts to 35 knots. Not making much progress tonight.
Making slow progress in NW winds.
Sailing NE on NW winds of about 15 knots.
Motoring N on NW winds of about 10 knots.
Motor sailing N in light WNW winds. Landfall  made about Paamiut.  1st Icebergs.
Sailing donwnwind in moderate swell to Satut and the inside passage to Nuuk.
At Wharf in Nuuk
Sailing to Sisimiut and the arctic circle
At wharf in Sisimiut.
Underway to Disko Bay.  Light SW winds and sunny.
Crossing Disko Bay.  Light NE winds, sunny.  Lots of icebergs.
At wharf in Ilulissat.  1430 M from C''town.
At wharf in Aasiaat. Heading south.
Motoring slowly to Sisumiut against SE winds
At Wharf in Sisumiut. Rain and fog
At anchor in Appamiut.  Beuatifful anchorage surrounded by  mountains, glaciers.
At anchor in Sermilinnguac Fiord below a glacier extending right to the water.
At wharf in Maniitsoq provisioning and waiting for favourable winds.
Heading for Nuuk in the morning fog
Back in Nuuk
Underway to Labrador. Light SW winds
Underway to Labrador. Light SW winds
Still motoring  to Labrador. Light W winds
Sailing in very light NE winds.  Sunny.
Beating into 25 knots SE wind. Nasty.
Motoring slowly south in big swell
At anchor in Domino Tickle.  Waiting for north winds.
Back in Battle Harbour
Transiting Strait of Belle Isle
Heading SW on south winds of 20 knots
Beating  South on south west winds of 20 knots
At Little Port Wharf, Nfld (find that on a map!)
Underway to Port aux Basques.  Strong NW winds
Underway to Bras D'Or Lakes.  Sailing soth in strong NW winds
Motoring south past St. Pauls Island.
At Anchor in Baddeck, NS.  Plan to cruisie the Bras D'or Lakes for a few days.
The only boat at anchor in Maskell's Harbour.
At anchor in Cape George Harbour
Strait of Canso Yacht Club. NW winds 25 - 30.
Heading for Charlottetown and home
